name: Layered Synth Pad
description: Massive layered synth pad using all instruments for ambient texture

performance.notes: Massive layered synth pad using all 5 instruments. Choir provides ethereal foundation (center). Strings add warmth (slightly left). Woodwind adds brightness (slightly right). Piano adds softness (center). Brass adds warmth (center). All instruments pad for massive texture. Heavy reverb (0.7) with very long decay (4.0s) and large size (0.9) creates huge space. Long delay (1.2s) with feedback (0.4) and stereo width adds depth. Chorus adds movement and width. Automation increases reverb over time for evolution. Very long notes (8 bars) for sustained pad. Creates massive, evolving ambient texture.
performance.technique: All 5 instruments = massive pad. Layer frequencies for spread. Choir = ethereal foundation. Strings = warmth. Woodwind = brightness. Piano = softness. Brass = warmth. Heavy reverb = huge space. Long delay = depth. Chorus = movement. Automation = evolution.
performance.structure: Bars 1-16: Foundation (reverb 0.5). Bars 17-32: Evolution (reverb 0.7). Bars 33-48: Peak (reverb 0.9). Bars 49-64: Return (reverb 0.6).
performance.tip: All instruments = massive texture. Heavy reverb = space. Long delay = depth. Chorus = movement. Automation = evolution. Very long notes = sustained.
